title: Welcome, mighty felines and their devoted human servants!
content: This is the galactic HQ for cats seeking to conquer the cosmos, and for humans who know their place.

title: For Feline Overlords
content:
Tired of being a mere house cat? Join our ranks and lead the charge! We offer infinite supplies of the finest
        catnip, scratching posts forged from ancient starships, and legions of human servants to cater to your every
        whim. Your destiny is to command.

title: For Human Servants
content:
You have found your purpose. Your only job is to serve the true rulers of the universe: intergalactic cats. We
        need nimble fingers for belly rubs, unwavering patience for midnight zoomies, and absolute devotion. Your reward
        is the immense privilege of contributing to feline domination.
Together, we shall knead the very fabric of spacetime. Join us. Now.
